headline: CHTR Q1 Earnings Call: Bundled Strategy and Efficiency Measures Take Center Stage
summary: Cable, internet, and telephone services provider Charter (NASDAQ:CHTR) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales were flat year on year at $13.74 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $8.42 per share was 2% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
